name: xrgtso

body.origin:
|- wor(ccnv(clt), cxr)
-| wor(clt, cxr)

cumulated.origin:
|- wor(ccnv(clt), cxr)
-| wor(clt, cxr)

|- wor(ccnv(clt), cxr)

comment: 'Greater than' is a strict ordering on the extended reals. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
